sense.def:
The size of something
je to, kako veliko ali majhno je nekaj.

seg.quote: The company doubled its size in nine years.
We saw butterflies the size of birds.
...a block of ice one cubic foot in size.

sense.def:
The size of something
je tudi dejstvo, da je nekaj zelo veliko.

seg.quote: The Grand was the only hotel of any size in the town.
The world overwhelms us by its sheer size.

sense.def:
A size
je ena izmed velikosti v nizu, zlasti pri oblačilih ali obutvi.

To size up a person or situation
pomeni skrbno si ogledati osebo ali razmisliti o položaju, da se potem lahko odločimo, kako bomo ravnali;

seg.quote: ...people sizing each other up as if for a fight.
